snippet: Justices from across the ideological spectrum seemed to reject arguments by the government that discounted statutes of limitations on certain kinds of civil lawsuits.
abstract: Supreme Court justices from across ideological spectrum seem to reject arguments by government that discount statutes of limitations on certain kinds of civil lawsuits, specifically those cases involving fraud.
lead_paragraph: Justices from across the ideological spectrum seemed to reject arguments by the government that discounted statutes of limitations on certain kinds of civil lawsuits.
